mapper.sql: cn.id, cn.cms_news_name , cu.cms_user_uname, cs.cms_status_word, cn.cms_news_ptime, cp.cms_part_name
cn.id, cn.cms_news_name , cu.cms_user_uname, cn.cms_news_hits, cn.cms_news_ptime, cn.cms_news_imgurl, cn.cms_news_content
mapper.select:
select
from cms_news cn left join cms_user cu on cn.userid=cu.id left join cms_part cp on cn.partid=cp.id left join cms_status cs on cn.cms_news_status=cs.cms_status_id order by cms_news_ptime desc limit #{0},#{1}
select count(*) as rows from cms_news
select count(*) as rows from cms_news cn left join cms_part cp on cp.cms_part_name=#{partname} where cn.partid=cp.id

select
from cms_news cn left join cms_user cu on cn.userid=cu.id where cn.id=#{id}

select cn.id, cn.cms_news_name , cu.cms_user_uname, cn.cms_news_status, cn.cms_news_ptime from cms_news cn left join cms_user cu on cn.userid=cu.id where cn.cms_news_name like ${keywords} limit #{1},#{2}
select cp.id from cms_part cp where cp.cms_part_name=#{cms_part_name}

select cn.id, cn.cms_news_name, cu.cms_user_uname, cn.cms_news_content, cp.cms_part_name, cn.cms_news_ptime, cn.cms_news_imgurl, cs.cms_status_word from cms_news cn left join cms_user cu on cn.userid=cu.id left join cms_part cp on cn.partid=cp.id left join cms_status cs on cn.cms_news_status=cs.cms_status_id where cn.id=#{id}

select
from cms_news cn left join cms_user cu on cn.userid=cu.id left join cms_part cp on cp.cms_part_name=#{partname} left join cms_status cs on cn.cms_news_status=cs.cms_status_id where cn.partid=cp.id limit #{1},#{2}
select cn.id,cn.cms_news_name from cms_news cn order by cn.cms_news_ptime desc limit 9
select cn.id,cn.cms_news_name from cms_news cn where cn.cms_news_status='0' limit 9
select cn.id,cn.cms_news_name,cn.cms_news_hits from cms_news cn ORDER BY cn.cms_news_hits DESC limit 9

select
from cms_news cn left join cms_user cu on cn.userid=cu.id left join cms_part cp on cn.partid=cp.id left join cms_status cs on cn.cms_news_status=cs.cms_status_id where cn.cms_news_status='0' limit #{1},#{2}
select count(*) as rows from cms_news where cms_news_status='0'
select DATE_FORMAT(cms_record_logtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as logtime from cms_record order by id desc limit 1,1
